title: Listening-Comprehension: The Meeting
description: Verfolge ein kurzes Meeting-Protokoll und beantworte danach drei Verstaendnisfragen.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Good morning team. We need to move the mobile release.

lines.speaker: Liam
lines.text: Is the current deadline still Friday?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: No, quality checks are incomplete. The new deadline is next Tuesday at 4 PM.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Sofia will send an update to support and sales by noon.

lines.speaker: Sofia
lines.text: Understood. I will share the update before 12:00.

questions.question: When is the new deadline?
questions.explanation: Emma states that the new deadline is next Tuesday at 4 PM.

questions.question: Why is the release moved?

options.text: The client asked for another feature
The team is waiting for legal approval

questions.explanation: The reason named in the meeting is incomplete quality checks.

questions.question: Who sends the update to support and sales?
questions.explanation: Emma assigns this task to Sofia.
